trafficsimulator.simulator.traci

Interface TraciService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TraciServiceImpl

    public interface TraciService
    Interface for component responsible for communication with TraCI library TraCI library's purpose is to handle simulation in real time
    Author:
    Petr Svana

      • startSimulation

        void startSimulation()
              throws TraciException
        Initializes the simulation
        Throws:
        TraciException - when some of the traci calls fails

      • stopSimulation

        void stopSimulation()
        Finishes the simulation

      • detectorIsOccupied

        boolean detectorIsOccupied(java.lang.String detectorId,
                           int laneId)
                    throws TraciException
        Performs check of the detector if vehicle was present on it in previous step
        Parameters:
        detectorId - detector to check
        laneId - lane where is the detector
        Returns:
        true if the detector is occupied; false otherwise
        Throws:
        TraciException - when traci call fails
